name: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 brings the experience of the original game to an unparalleled level. The enhanced graphics pay tribute to the comic books and the gameplay has been totally redesigned to make fighting the Romans even more fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 (3.3 GHz)/AMD FX-4100 (3.6 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB, GeForce GTX 560/Radeon HD 7790 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8350 (4.0 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 760/Radeon R7 370 Storage: 2 GB available space
